abstract: Sanofi-Aventis sees a reasonable chance of buying U.S. biotech Genzyme at a fair price, but expects it will take some time to agree a deal that would further diversify the French drugmaker and strengthen its U.S. foothold, Reuters reported.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis sees a reasonable chance of buying U.S. biotech Genzyme at a fair price, but expects it will take some time to agree a deal that would further diversify the French drugmaker and strengthen its U.S. foothold, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis sees a reasonable chance of buying American biotech Genzyme at a fair price, but expects it will take some time to agree a deal that would further diversify the French drug maker and strengthen its United States foothold, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Sanofi Chief: ‘Reasonable’ Chance of Genzyme Deal
